name: io.github.agentc22/x402engine-mcp
title: x402 Engine
description: Pay-per-call AI APIs for agents: image generation, code execution, transcription, crypto data, blockchain analytics, and IPFS storage. Payments via USDC on Base/Solana or USDm on MegaETH using the HTTP 402 protocol.

environmentVariables.name: X402_DEV_BYPASS
environmentVariables.description: Dev bypass secret to skip payments during testing

environmentVariables.name: X402_PAYMENT_HEADER
environmentVariables.description: Pre-signed x402 payment header for automatic payment
